My Todo
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Todo } from './../../models/Todo'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todos', templateUrl: './todos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todos.component.css'] }) export class TodosComponent implements OnInit { todos: Todo[]; constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { this.todos = [ { content: 'First todo', completed: false }, { content: 'Second todo', completed: true } ] } }
